cast.name: 罗伯特·林德森 Robert Lindsay
佐伊·沃纳梅克 Zoë Wanamaker
加布瑞尔·汤姆森 Gabriel Thomson
丹妮拉·丹拜-阿什 Daniela Denby-Ashe
克里斯·马歇尔 Kris Marshall

trans_title: 我的一家人 第五季
introduction: In Series five, Ben and Susan are enjoying some new-found tranquility, Nick has moved into his own flat, Janey is at university and Abi is usually out at evening class. Naturally the peace is not to last! Janey comes back home with baby Kenzo and Michael has been "born again" and is holding Bible study sessions in the living room. With Ben's famous dental patients, Susan's election ambitions and an unheathly obsession with Inspector Morse – not to mention the unlikely perils of house-sitting in a luxury modern apartment – domestic life is soon to be back to normal. So when Ben and Susan start being nice to each other it's no wonder Abi's suspicious; they could not be getting a divorce could they?
chinese_title: 我的一家人 第五季
